mapper.insert: insert into user(name, ss_number, openid, password, create_time, last_login_time) values (#{name}, #{ssNumber}, #{openid}, #{password}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.select: select remain_money, avatar_url, college_name, address, (select COUNT(id) from `order` where buyer_ss_number = #{ssNumber}) as boughtCount, (select COUNT(id) from user_doc_star where ss_number = #{ssNumber} and DELETED = 0) as starCount, (select COUNT(id) from doc where ss_number = #{ssNumber} ) as uploadCount, contact, introduce, scholar_introduce, user.name, user.ss_number, user.college_name, user.major_name from user inner join school_stu on school_stu.ss_number = user.ss_number where user.ss_number = #{ssNumber}

SELECT name, like_count, be_star_count as starCount, ss_number, introduce, scholar_introduce, major_name as major, college_name as college
from user where user.ss_number = #{ssNumber}
